title: Net ionic rxn - HC2H3O2 titrated with NaOH

content.question: A 20. mL sample of 0.50 M HC2H3O2(aq) is titrated with 0.50 M NaOH(aq). Which of the following best represents the species that react and the species produced in the reaction?

choices.label: H+(aq) + C2H3O2−(aq) + Na+(aq) + OH−(aq) → H2O(l) + NaC2H3O2(aq)

skill.text: 5.E: Determine a balanced chemical equation for a given chemical phenomenon.
